thread.title: Imagis requested to repay loan immediately
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Imagis requested to repay loan immediately | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Imagis requested to repay loan immediately
text:
Sept 8 Imagis SA :
* Said on Monday that Bank Zachodni WBK SA demands the immediate payment of the investment loan which was granted to the company on Jan. 9, 2013
* 9.0 million zlotys ($2.4 million) which is due, has to be repaid within 7 days
Source text for Eikon:
($1 = 3.7770 zlotys) (Gdynia Newsroom)
